Dependent Variable Description: log GDP percapita (PPPbasis) in 1995, currentprices (from the World Bank's World Development Indicators 1999)
Independent Variable Description: measured on a scale from 0 to 10, where a higher score means more protection against expropriation, averaged over 1985 to 1995, from Political Risk Services
Title: The Colonial Origins of Comparative Development: An Empirical Investigation
Author(s): Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson, James A. Robinson

Dependent Variable Description: log GDP percapita (PPPbasis) in 1995, currentprices (from the World Bank's World Development Indicators 1999)
Independent Variable Description: measured on a scale from 0 to 10, where a higher score means more protection against expropriation, averaged over 1985 to 1995, from Political Risk Services
Title: The Colonial Origins of Comparative Development: An Empirical Investigation
Author(s): Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson, James A. Robinson

Dependent Variable Description: log GDP percapita (PPPbasis) in 1995, currentprices (from the World Bank's World Development Indicators 1999)
Independent Variable Description: measured on a scale from 0 to 10, where a higher score means more protection against expropriation, averaged over 1985 to 1995, from Political Risk Services
Other independent variables / controls: latitude; Asia dummy; Africa dummy; Other continent dummy
Title: The Colonial Origins of Comparative Development: An Empirical Investigation
Author(s): Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson, James A. Robinson

Dependent Variable Description: log output per worker in 1988 from Hall and Jones (1999)
Independent Variable Description: measured on a scale from 0 to 10, where a higher score means more protection against expropriation, averaged over 1985 to 1995, from Political Risk Services
Title: The Colonial Origins of Comparative Development: An Empirical Investigation
Author(s): Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson, James A. Robinson
